content: get ready to add a touch of whimsy to your home with the simple gnome basket crochet pattern this intermediate-level project is perfect for those looking to expand their crochet skills while creating a charming and functional piece the pattern includes detailed written instructions and a video tutorial to guide you through each step worked in the round this pattern features a cute gnome design that will bring a smile to your face every time you see it the finished basket measures approximately 7 inches across and 13 inches tall when assembled making it ideal for storing small items or displaying as a decorative accent using bernat s plush big jumbo weight yarn this basket is not only quick to make but also incredibly soft and cozy whether you re a seasoned crocheter or looking to challenge yourself with a new project the simple gnome basket is sure to delight and inspire
